ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] fun
ygData.msgSnippet: ... *waves to Dungar* That is you, right?   ;-)    So glad you made it to FV... I know you found it disconcerting that it s so much quieter than you re used
ygData.messageBody:
>I found a new server that I likw.  The Fionia Vie server is >great people are nice and there are alot of creatures to kill >in the newbie area. 
> 
>    I am glad it is a role playing server, I only speak dwarf >fluently but am learnig human and i have some gnome.  >Does anyone know what drops crude bronze ore?
 
 
*waves to Dungar*
 
That is you, right?   ;-)    So glad you made it to FV... I know you found it disconcerting that it's so much quieter than you're used to, but you have to admit the absence (mostly) of moronic chatter is a nice change.  :-)
 
Sorry I couldn't talk to you that much... I was trying to spend time with my dear Druid love, and we also had some big guild business going on, and it was just hectic.  :-)
 
If you'd like to meet sometime, I'd be happy to teach you Elvish, and pretty much any other language you'd like to learn.
 
Take care, brave Dwarf, and I shall see you in Norrath!
 
~Kyndara Silverleaf~
Ranger in her 35th season of service to Karana,
Firiona Vie
<Ring of the Light>
